name: Near Earth LLC
overview:
Through Near Earth Capital we provide a full range of private placement, corporate finance, and mergers & acquisition services to emerging as well as established companies in our sectors of specialization. Reflecting the extensive industry-focused track records of our team of professionals, comprising more than 30 years and $15 billion in aggregate transactional experience at major Wall Street firms, we maintain high-level relationships with the leading corporations and institutional investors in our field.

Through Near Earth Advisory we provide a broad range of financial advisory services to companies and investors in the satellite, telecom and aerospace industries. Such services have included fairness opinions, valuations, business plan development, industry studies, and expert witness testimony. As the background of our professionals includes equity research as well as specific industry experience, we are able to serve our corporate and investor clients with the highest quality analysis and recommendations.
